titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Special Committee on Aging.

calendar.text: Committee on Aging ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Aging. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Melcher. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 1/16/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Senate Special Committee on Aging, from March 1, 1987, through February 29, 1988, to: (1) make expenditures from the contingent fund; (2) employ personnel; (3) utilize, on a reimbursable basis, the services of department or agency personnel; (4) procure consultant services; and (5) provide for the training of its professional staff.
